rationale: The segment discusses proper cooking temperatures but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Properly cooking poultry and eggs to 165 degrees Fahrenheit (73.89 degrees Celsius) will also kill any viruses.
